desc: Our Mission is to raise Millions for Charities in need. Best known for helping WIRES saving wildlife during the bushfires in Australia, the Discover Wildlife Team contributes one of the most successful orphan animals rescue and rehabilitation program in the world. 77'000 USD donated to Save Wildlife

layout.text: THE ONLY BRACELET THAT SAVES AN ANIMAL’S LIFE
SPEAK FOR THE ONES WITHOUT A VOICE
